chinese: 孑孑干旄、在浚之郊。素絲紕之、良馬四之。彼姝者子、何以畀之。
english: Conspiciously rise the staffs with their ox-tails,In the distant suburbs of Jun,Ornamented with the white silk bands;There are four carriages with their good horses,That admirable gentleman, -What will he give them [for his]?

chinese: 孑孑干旟、在浚之都。素絲組之、良馬五之。彼姝者子、何以予之。
english: Conspiciously rise the staffs with their falcon-banners,In the nearer suburbs of Jun,Ornamented with the white silk ribbons;There are four carriages with their good horses,That admirable gentleman, -What will he give them [for his]?

chinese: 孑孑干旌、在浚之城。素絲祝之、良馬六之。彼姝者子、何以告之。
english: Conspiciously rise the staffs with their feathered streamers,At the walls of Jun,Bound with the white silk cords;There are six carriages with their good horses,That admirable gentleman, -What will he give them [for his]?
